attributes.action: Strip Russian cheats of unfair Medals awarded at London 2012 Olympics.
attributes.additional_details: Russian sport has found to be in disgrace with proof of wholesale drug doping since 2010. Since the UK hosted the 2012 Olympics the UK has a moral duty to act. If we do nothing then we have failed in our duty as hosts and condone the fraud.
attributes.background: Russian sportsmen and women involved in drug doping should be retrospectively disqualified and the results of other competitors promoted. Medals should be awarded to those that deserve them. This re-assessment of results should include all major competitions, including the 2012 and 2014 Olympics.

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the International Olympic Committee:

https://www.olympic.org/the-ioc
